ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen concentrated peach mango juice (such as DoleÂ®)
des: "I came up with this recipe after having a similar sangria at a popular steakhouse (Carrabba'sÂ®). This has become a favorite of everyone who has tried it! Easy and delicious! Add chopped fruit if you like. Store any leftover sangria in the refrigerator."
ins: Mix Cabernet Sauvignon, blackberry brandy, peach mango juice, pineapple juice, and water in a large pitcher to make sangria. Serve over ice.
